elements.title: How many buildings are in this homestead?

validators.text: Value must be one or greater

elements.title: Does this homestead have any LLINs used while sleeping?

elements.title: If yes, how many LLINs does the homestead own?

elements.title: How many rooms are in this homestead?  ( Count all rooms in all buildings)

elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead are modern?

elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead are traditional?

elements.title: How many other structures are in this homestead? (Other structures such as toilets and corridors)

elements.title: Were there any rooms SPRAYED in this homestead?

elements.title: How many rooms were sprayed?

elements.title: How many other structures in this homestead were sprayed?

elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead were sprayed with DDT? ( If none, enter 0)

elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead were sprayed with Lambdacyhalothrin? ( If none, enter 0)

elements.title: How many other structures in this homestead were sprayed with DDT? ( if none, enter 0)

elements.name: number_other_sprayed_lambdacyhalothrin
elements.title: How many other structures in this homestead were sprayed with Lambdacyhalothrin?

elements.name: any_unsprayed
elements.title: Were there any UNSPRAYED rooms in this homestead?

elements.title: How many rooms were NOT sprayed?

elements.title: How many UNSPRAYED rooms in this homestead are modern?

elements.title: How many UNSPRAYED rooms in this homestead are traditional?

elements.name: n_unsprayed_reason_partialspray
rooms_locked
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed because it was locked?

elements.name: n_rooms_nobody
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed because nobody was home?

elements.name: n_rooms_refused
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed because occupants refused spraying?

elements.name: n_rooms_baby
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed because the house has new born baby?

elements.name: n_rooms_patient
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed because the house has a patient?

elements.name: n_rooms_funeral
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed due to a funeral?

elements.name: n_rooms_kitchen
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed because they are kitchens?

elements.name: n_rooms_food
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed because they food storage areas?

elements.name: n_rooms_material
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed due to non-sprayable material (ie canvas)?

elements.name: n_rooms_other
elements.title: How many rooms were not sprayed due to the "other" refusal reason provided before?
Of the number of unsprayed rooms, please list the number of rooms unsprayed for each reason:
